name: escalation_clause_amount
title: How much more would you like to increase the purchase price over the highest buyer's offer?
label: Escalation Amount
description: Enter an amount that you are willing to pay in addition to the highest competing buyer's offer.
tips: An escalation clause allows you to automatically increase your offer above competing bids up to your maximum amount.
small_print: You will want to speak with your lender to make sure this financial responsiblity is within the scope of your loan and does not exceed appraisal value, otherwise the discrepancy between purchase price and appraisal will need to come out of pocket.
